dict.acceptation: 精确的，准确的；正确无误的；

sent.orig: You are to use accurate scales, an accurate ephah and an accurate bath.
sent.trans: 你们要用公道天平、道伊法、道罢特。

sent.orig: For this reason, an accurate stable reference is not necessary to achieve accurate measurements.
sent.trans: 因此，准确稳定的参考不能必然完成准确测量。

sent.orig: It has the merits of accurate position, stable conveying, accurate measuring and simple operation.
sent.trans: 具有定位准确，传动平稳，计量准确，简单等优点。

sent.orig: To very accurate measurement, can consider to choose accurate frequency fiducial.
sent.trans: 对于很是切确的测量，能够思忖选择切确的频率基准。

sent.orig: Accurate CCD and black-box control functions, so that you each experiment similarly consistent and accurate results.
sent.trans: 有精确的CCD和暗箱调控功能，使您每次的实验结果同样地一致和准确。
